tool.name: Filter.shared
tool.description: remove OTUs based on various critieria
tool.command:
echo 'filter.shared( shared=$otu, #if $label: label=${ str($label).replace(",","-") }, #end if #if $label: groups=${ str($groups).replace(",","-") }, #end if minabund=$minabund, minpercent=$minpercent, rarepercent=$rarepercent, keepties=$keepties, minnumsamples=$minnumsamples, minpercentsamples=$minpercentsamples, mintotal=$mintotal, makerare=$makerare )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.filter.* . && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile"

param.name: label
param.label: label - OTU Labels
param.help: If none selected, all labels will be output

param.name: groups
param.label: Select groups for to include in this grouping

param.name: minabund
param.label: minabund - indicate the minimum abundance required for each sample in a given OTU
param.help: If any samples abundance falls below the minimum, the OTU is removed. Default=0

param.name: minpercent
param.label: minpercent - indicate the minimum relative abundance of an OTU
param.help: For example, if the OTUs total abundance across all samples is 8, and the total abundance across all OTUs is 1000, and minpercent=1. The OTU's relative abundance is 0.008, the minimum is 0.01, so the OTU will be removed (Default=0)

param.name: rarepercent
param.label: rarepercent - indicate the percentage of otus to remove
param.help: The OTUs chosen to be removed are the rarest. For example if you have 1000 OTUs, rarepercent=20 would remove the 200 OTUs with the lowest abundance (Default=0)

param.name: keepties
param.label: keepties - indicate you want to keep the OTUs with the same abundance as the first 'not rare' OTU
param.help: For example if you have 10 OTUs, rarepercent=20 abundances of 20, 18, 15, 15, 10, 5, 3, 3, 3, 1. keepties=t, would remove the 10th OTU, but keep the 9th because its abundance ties the 8th OTU. keepties=f would remove OTUs 9 and 10 (Default=T)

param.name: minnumsamples
param.label: minnumsamples - indicate the minimum number of samples present in an OTU
param.help: If the number of samples present falls below the minimum, the OTU is removed (Default=0)

param.name: minpercentsamples
param.label: minpercentsamples - indicate the minimum percent of sample present in an OTU
param.help: For example, if the total number of samples is 10, the number present is 3, and the minpercentsamples=50. The OTU's precent of samples is 0.333, the minimum is 0.50, so the OTU will be removed (Default=0)

param.name: mintotal
param.label: mintotal - indicate the minimum abundance required for a given OTU
param.help: If abundance across all samples falls below the minimum, the OTU is removed (Default=0)

param.name: makerare
param.label: makerare - indicate you want the abundances of any removed OTUs to be saved and a new rare OTU created with its abundances equal to the sum of the OTUs removed
param.help: This will preserve the number of reads in your dataset (Default=T)

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The filter.shared_ is used to remove OTUs based on various critieria.
.. _filter.shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Filter.shared
